name: Naval Battle Online
description:
Upgrade your ship, level up and make sure you're strong enough to send your enemies overboard. Equip your ship with advanced cannons, elite cannonballs, a qualified crew and skilled pirates. And don't miss out on the many special materials that will help you on your way to becoming a glorious pirate.

Build your own mighty army and strike fear into your enemies by building or joining a fleet in Naval Battle Online. Together you can conquer the islands and become a very strong wedding ring. Be the ruler of the great seas.

By taking daily quests, you can gain more experience points and speed up your development. Reinforce your friendships and show that you are a great team player by participating in regular events.

If your ship is stronger than other players, you can see your ship name in the game ranking.
